SELECT
FROM sys_user sys_user LEFT JOIN sys_user_role AS ur ON ur.user_id = sys_user.id LEFT JOIN sys_role AS r ON r.id = ur.role_id LEFT JOIN sys_organ AS d ON d.id = sys_user.organ_id WHERE sys_user.id = #{id}

SELECT sys_user.id, sys_user.username, sys_user.email, sys_user.`password`, sys_user.salt, sys_user.phone, sys_user.avatar, sys_user.wx_openid, sys_user.qq_openid, sys_user.organ_id, sys_user.create_time AS ucreate_time, sys_user.update_time AS uupdate_time, sys_user.del_flag AS udel_flag, sys_user.lock_flag AS lock_flag, sys_user.tenant_id, d.name AS organName FROM sys_user sys_user LEFT JOIN sys_organ AS d ON d.id = sys_user.organ_id
and sys_user.username LIKE CONCAT('%',#{query.username},'%')
and sys_user.organ_id IN (SELECT `descendant` FROM `sys_organ_relation` WHERE `ancestor` = #{query.organId})
ORDER BY sys_user.create_time DESC
